text: such a fantastic game. 70 in-game hours for my first playthrough (i had 4-5 idle hours where i left the game on), with such likable characters and such a vast open world to explore. there's few games out there like this one. this could really use a Steam re-release, or a sequel one day. one day... lol.

text: @linktheslayer15 The audio is compressed on GameCube as a tradeoff from converting two GD-ROMs (1 GB max each) into a Mini-DVD (1.5 GB max)

author: Bainbridge

text: I've been super busy since coming back from vacation, in terms of work to do (gotta catch up!) and socially. I feel like all my friends were born in May and I'm swamped in birthday party invitations, including yesterday and tomorrow. Oh, and I was born in May as well! Anyways, looking back at my comment on the last Skies of Arcadia upload, I said that I desperately wanted a sequel to this game and Shenmue 2, but that I was slowly giving up on the idea. With Shenmue 3 now in development, let's hope Skies of Arcadia 2 ends up happening as well!
author: SupraDarky
